description:
Our client is a visionary and dynamic Swiss global enterprise which produces and distributes exclusive, high quality consumer goods in over 40 countries. A unique patented healthy food preparing system as well as patented products in the area of medical devices and health care products are just a few examples of the exclusive range of high quality, innovative products

 

The “Brand Names” of our client have been well known internationally and also in Ukraine for many years. For the further expansion of our client’s activities we are now seeking an experienced, highly driven, enthusiastic person.

 

Primary responsibilities:

 

  • Management of existing sales channels
  • Actively develop new business opportunities through sales strategies, focusing on customers in target markets.
  • Oversee the sales force and coordinate actions with them.
  • Achieve profit targets.
  • Represent the company at trade fairs

 

Qualifications:

  • 5-10+ years of experience in sales management and direct marketing (preferably in the field of consumer products) and most importantly in depth operational sales experience.
  • Bachelor’s Degree in sales, marketing or related field
  • Proven track record of taking new and innovative products to market
  • Team player with the ability to motivate and lead
  • Excellent sales and negotiation skills
  • Good planning, report writing and organizational skills

 

Your entry into one of the World‘s market leaders requires unlimited mobility, team spirit and a high degree of personal zeal. We take it for granted that you have advanced computer and English skills. Our client can provide a professional and transparent working environment, where dedication, drive and results will be acknowledged and rewarded.

 

We look forward to receiving your complete application documents (photograph, references, certificates and Curriculum Vitae including your salary expectations and possible date of entry) and will get in touch with you shortly.

 

Please send your application to: 

 

ECconsult GmbH

Ms. Heidi Saenger

Fliethstrasse 110

D-41061 M?nchengladbach / Germany

 

All information that you supply us with will be handled in the strictest of confidence.
